item.title: Gridware Cybersecurity Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Gridware Cybersecurity Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsNovember 12, 2024Gridware Cybersecurityis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Gridware software, services, and infrastructure issues, as well as vulnerabilities discovered by or reported to Gridware researchers that are not in another CNA’s scope.

item.title: Beckman Coulter Diagnostics Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Beckman Coulter Diagnostics Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsNovember 12, 2024Beckman Coulter Diagnosticsis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Beckman Coulter Diagnostics manufactured products and technologies only.

item.title: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on October 30 Now Available
item.description: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on October 30 Now AvailablenewsNovember 19, 2024TheCVE Boardheld a teleconference meeting on October 30, 2024. Read themeeting minutes summary.

item.title: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 224 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for November 18, 2024
item.description: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 224 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for November 18, 2024blogBy CVE Program|November 19, 2024The “CNA Enrichment Recognition List” for November 18, 2024, is now available with 224 CNAs listed. Published every two weeks on the CVE website, the list recognizes thoseCVE Numbering Authorities (CNAs)that are actively providing enhanced vulnerability data in theirCVE Records. CNAs are added to the list if they provideCommon Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS)andCommon Weakness Enumeration (CWE™)information 98% of the time or more within the two-week period of their last published CVE Record.

item.title: Omnissa Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Omnissa Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsNovember 19, 2024Omnissa, LLCis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for all Omnissa products and services, including Workspace ONE and Horizon.

item.title: Follow the CVE Program on Bluesky!
item.description: Follow the CVE Program on Bluesky!newsDecember 3, 2024The CVE Program is now onBluesky! Please follow us for program news, new partner announcements, updates on community activities, and more at@cveprogram.bsky.social.

item.title: 31,770 CVE Records Used as Basis for the “2024 CWE Top 25 Most Dangerous Software Weaknesses List”
item.description: 31,770 CVE Records Used as Basis for the “2024 CWE Top 25 Most Dangerous Software Weaknesses List”blogBy CVE Program|December 3, 2024The2024 CWE Top 25 Most Dangerous Software Weaknesseslist was released by theCommon Weakness Enumeration (CWE™) Programon November 19, 2024. The newly released list highlights the most severe and prevalent weaknesses behind the31,770 CVE Records mapped in the 2024 dataset.

item.title: Videos fromCVE Program CNA Workshop 2024Now Available
item.description: Videos fromCVE Program CNA Workshop 2024Now AvailableblogBy CVE Program|December 3, 2024Videos from all 15 sessions of the virtualCVE Program CNA Workshop 2024, held October 29-30, 2024, are now available on theCVE Program Channel on YouTube. CVE Program workshops are a way for theCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)community to regularly collaborate on specific topics in a focused manner. Discussions are always informative, and many sessions result in creative recommendations from community member that directly impact and enhance the program.

item.title: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 224 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for December 2, 2024
item.description: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 224 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for December 2, 2024blogBy CVE Program|December 3, 2024The “CNA Enrichment Recognition List” for December 2, 2024, is now available with 224 CNAs listed. Published every two weeks on the CVE website, the list recognizes thoseCVE Numbering Authorities (CNAs)that are actively providing enhanced vulnerability data in theirCVE Records. CNAs are added to the list if they provideCommon Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS)andCommon Weakness Enumeration (CWE™)information 98% of the time or more within the two-week period of their last published CVE Record.

item.title: GraphQL Java Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: GraphQL Java Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsDecember 3, 2024GraphQL Javais now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for GraphQL Java, Java DataLoader, GraphQL Java Extended Scalars, and GraphQL Java Extended Validation.
